Gather.Say: Press 1 to hear something true about you.
Press 2 for some information about today.
Press 4 if you need some advice.
Press 5 for info about the weather.
Press 6 if you need some technical help.
Press 7 if you want to know todays weather.
Press 8 if you are unsure what to eat today
Press 9 to ask ChatGPT for help.
